name: convex-client-nextjs
title: Convex Client for Next.js
description: Convex client setup for Next.js with authentication support
docs:
## Post-Install Setup

1. Run `npx convex dev` to start the Convex dev server and get your deployment URL.

2. Copy the deployment URL to your `.env.local` file as `NEXT_PUBLIC_CONVEX_URL`.

3. Wrap your app with the `ConvexAuthProvider` from `lib/convex/provider.tsx`.
